agents.flight.AircraftDepartingHandler¶

class agents.flight.AircraftDepartingHandler(agent)¶

Bases: Role

ADH: Aircraft Departing Handler

Description: When the time of the pushback arrives then the taxi out and the takeoff time are computed. 1. Request taxi-out time 2. Compute takeoff time

__init__(agent)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

Methods

__init__(agent)

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

check_push_back()

Wait until push back event then at that moment request taxi-out time

do_taxi_out()

Wait the taxi-out time and then succeed the event

request_taxi_out_time()

send(msg)

Function to send messages to its own agent

wait_for_taxi_out_time(msg)

Once we receive the taxi-out time update ATOT and do the taxi-out time
